### Prerequisits
```{r cars, message=FALSE}
library("dplyr")
library("tidyverse")
library("readr")
```


```{r}
data1 <- read.csv("/Users/malin/Downloads/shiny/data/general_characteristics_SW_0722.csv")
data2 <- read.csv("/Users/malin/Downloads/shiny/data/perception_SW_0722.csv")
data3 <- read.csv("/Users/malin/Downloads/shiny/data/production_SW_0722.csv")
```

```{r}
merged_data <- merge(merge(data1, data2, by = "Paper", all = TRUE), data3, by = "Paper", all = TRUE)

merged_data_unique <- merged_data |>
  mutate(Paper = str_trim(Paper)) |> 
  distinct(Paper) # , .keep_all = TRUE
```

```{r}
write.csv(merged_data_unique, "papers_prosody_on_spectrum.csv", row.names = FALSE)

```
